explicit

Class STPGModelChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • prism.PrismComponent
      • explicit.StateModelChecker
        • explicit.NonProbModelChecker
          • explicit.ProbModelChecker
            • explicit.STPGModelChecker

  • public class STPGModelChecker
extends ProbModelChecker
    Explicit-state model checker for two-player stochastic games (STPGs).

      • computeNextProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeNextProbs(STPG stpg,
                                           java.util.BitSet target,
                                           boolean min1,
                                           boolean min2)
                                    throws PrismException
        Compute next=state probabilities. i.e. compute the probability of being in a state in target in the next step.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachProbs

                                            java.util.BitSet target,
                                            boolean min1,
                                            boolean min2)
                                     throws PrismException
        Compute reachability probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeUntilProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeUntilProbs(STPG stpg,
                                            java.util.BitSet remain,
                                            java.util.BitSet target,
                                            boolean min1,
                                            boolean min2)
                                     throws PrismException
        Compute until probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target, while remaining in those in remain.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeReachProbs(STPG stpg,
                                            java.util.BitSet remain,
                                            java.util.BitSet target,
                                            boolean min1,
                                            boolean min2,
                                            double[] init,
                                            java.util.BitSet known)
                                     throws PrismException
        Compute reachability/until probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target, while remaining in those in remain.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        init - Optionally, an initial solution vector (may be overwritten)
        known - Optionally, a set of states for which the exact answer is known Note: if 'known' is specified (i.e. is non-null, 'init' must also be given and is used for the exact values.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • prob0

        public java.util.BitSet prob0(STPG stpg,
                              java.util.BitSet remain,
                              java.util.BitSet target,
                              boolean min1,
                              boolean min2)
        Prob0 precomputation algorithm. i.e. determine the states of an STPG which, with min/max probability 0, reach a state in target, while remaining in those in remain. min=true gives Prob0E, min=false gives Prob0A.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)

      • prob1

        public java.util.BitSet prob1(STPG stpg,
                              java.util.BitSet remain,
                              java.util.BitSet target,
                              boolean min1,
                              boolean min2)
        Prob1 precomputation algorithm. i.e. determine the states of an STPG which, with min/max probability 1, reach a state in target, while remaining in those in remain.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)

      • computeReachProbsValIter

        protected ModelCheckerResult computeReachProbsValIter(STPG stpg,
                                                      java.util.BitSet no,
                                                      java.util.BitSet yes,
                                                      boolean min1,
                                                      boolean min2,
                                                      double[] init,
                                                      java.util.BitSet known)
                                               throws PrismException
        Compute reachability probabilities using value iteration.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        no - Probability 0 states
        yes - Probability 1 states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        init - Optionally, an initial solution vector (will be overwritten)
        known - Optionally, a set of states for which the exact answer is known Note: if 'known' is specified (i.e. is non-null, 'init' must also be given and is used for the exact values.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachProbsGaussSeidel

                                                          boolean min1,
                                                          boolean min2,

                                                   throws PrismException
        Compute reachability probabilities using Gauss-Seidel.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        no - Probability 0 states
        yes - Probability 1 states
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        init - Optionally, an initial solution vector (will be overwritten)
        known - Optionally, a set of states for which the exact answer is known Note: if 'known' is specified (i.e. is non-null, 'init' must also be given and is used for the exact values.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • probReachStrategy

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> probReachStrategy(STPG stpg,
                                                           int state,
                                                           java.util.BitSet target,
                                                           boolean min1,
                                                           boolean min2,
                                                           double[] lastSoln)
                                                    throws PrismException
        Construct strategy information for min/max reachability probabilities. (More precisely, list of indices of player 1 choices resulting in min/max.) (Note: indices are guaranteed to be sorted in ascending order.)
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        state - The state to generate strategy info for
        target - The set of target states to reach
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        lastSoln - Vector of probabilities from which to recompute in one iteration
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeBoundedReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeBoundedReachProbs(STPG stpg,
                                                   java.util.BitSet target,
                                                   int k,
                                                   boolean min1,
                                                   boolean min2)
                                            throws PrismException
        Compute bounded reachability probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target within k steps.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        target - Target states
        k - Bound
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeBoundedUntilProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeBoundedUntilProbs(STPG stpg,
                                                   java.util.BitSet remain,
                                                   java.util.BitSet target,
                                                   int k,
                                                   boolean min1,
                                                   boolean min2)
                                            throws PrismException
        Compute bounded until probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target, within k steps, and while remaining in states in remain.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        k - Bound
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeBoundedReachProbs

        public ModelCheckerResult computeBoundedReachProbs(STPG stpg,
                                                   java.util.BitSet remain,
                                                   java.util.BitSet target,
                                                   int k,
                                                   boolean min1,
                                                   boolean min2,
                                                   double[] init,
                                                   double[] results)
                                            throws PrismException
        Compute bounded reachability/until probabilities. i.e. compute the min/max probability of reaching a state in target, within k steps, and while remaining in states in remain.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        remain - Remain in these states (optional: null means "all")
        target - Target states
        k - Bound
        min1 - Min or max probabilities for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max probabilities for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        init - Initial solution vector - pass null for default
        results - Optional array of size k+1 to store (init state) results for each step (null if unused)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachRewards

        public ModelCheckerResult computeReachRewards(STPG stpg,
                                              STPGRewards rewards,
                                              java.util.BitSet target,
                                              boolean min1,
                                              boolean min2)
                                       throws PrismException
        Compute expected reachability rewards.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        rewards - The rewards
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max rewards for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max rewards for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachRewards

        public ModelCheckerResult computeReachRewards(STPG stpg,
                                              STPGRewards rewards,
                                              java.util.BitSet target,
                                              boolean min1,
                                              boolean min2,
                                              double[] init,
                                              java.util.BitSet known)
                                       throws PrismException
        Compute expected reachability rewards. i.e. compute the min/max reward accumulated to reach a state in target.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        rewards - The rewards
        target - Target states
        min1 - Min or max rewards for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max rewards for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        init - Optionally, an initial solution vector (may be overwritten)
        known - Optionally, a set of states for which the exact answer is known Note: if 'known' is specified (i.e. is non-null, 'init' must also be given and is used for the exact values.
        Throws:
        PrismException

      • computeReachRewardsValIter

        protected ModelCheckerResult computeReachRewardsValIter(STPG stpg,
                                                        STPGRewards rewards,
                                                        java.util.BitSet target,
                                                        java.util.BitSet inf,
                                                        boolean min1,
                                                        boolean min2,
                                                        double[] init,
                                                        java.util.BitSet known)
                                                 throws PrismException
        Compute expected reachability rewards using value iteration.
        Parameters:
        stpg - The STPG
        rewards - The rewards
        target - Target states
        inf - States for which reward is infinite
        min1 - Min or max rewards for player 1 (true=min, false=max)
        min2 - Min or max rewards for player 2 (true=min, false=max)
        init - Optionally, an initial solution vector (will be overwritten)
        known - Optionally, a set of states for which the exact answer is known Note: if 'known' is specified (i.e. is non-null, 'init' must also be given and is used for the exact values.
        Throws:
        PrismException
